issue.title: Links moving/rotating at startup when they are in a chain of fixed joints using bullet physics

content.raw: I think this was fixed by @azeey in pull request #3010, which has been merged into the gazebo7, gazebo8, and gazebo9 branches, and released in gazebo 9.4.1. It hasn't been released in gazebo7 or gazebo8, but you should see the fix if you build gazebo from source.
